title: Melee Damage Bonus +10

Melee Damage Bonus: +10 Information

You have a +10 bonus to damage rolls you make with Heavy melee weapons.

How to unlock Melee Damage Bonus: +10

Melee Damage Bonus: +10 can be acquired by:

Great Weapon Master (Feat) grants this feature.
